label: Full Body Type I + Wings/Tail Type IV
desc: Full Body Type I + Wings/Tail Type IV

steps.text: Iceman, this is November One Two Three Alpha Bravo. We are configured for Type I. Engines are running, APU is off. Request full body Type I followed by Type IV on wings and tail only.
Captain, please prepare the aircraft for deicing.
November One Two Three Alpha Bravo, ready for deicing.
N123AB, starting application of Type I now.
N123AB, deicing with Type I complete. Standing by for Type IV configuration.
Iceman, this is November One Two Three Alpha Bravo. We are now configured for Type IV. Engines are running, APU is off.
N123AB, starting application of Type IV on wings and tail now.
Captain, N123AB, you have been anti-iced with Type IV, Cryotech Polar Guard X-Tend at 100%, starting at 17:04. Post deicing/anti-icing check complete, deicing personnel and equipment are safely away.
